transcript:
Customer: Hello, voice nahi aa rahi hai aapki. Haan ji.
Executive: Ji ji, abhi aa rahi hai sir voice?
Customer: Haan, abhi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Ji sir, to wahi matlab meri kehne ka ye matlab hai sir dekho, matlab aap dekho buyers jo hai jab search karta hai Google pe suppliers ya manufacturer dal ke sir, to usko listing mein jo suppliers top pe dikhte hain sir, first page pe, second page pe, third page pe maximum dikhte hain, unko apni inquiry dal dete hain aur even ek inquiry aapko IndiaMART ko bhi dal deta hai jab IndiaMART usko pop up dalta hai what's your requirement ka sir. To waha pe kya hota hai ki IndiaMART aapke paas as a buylead share kar deta hai wo cheezein. But kahin na kahin high demand of buyleads hai, high category hai aapki, jismein aap buyleads agar nahi consume kar pa rahe ho sir, to aapko apni listing improve karoge to wahi buyer jo IndiaMART ko apni requirement bata raha hai, wo buyer aapko directly apni requirement batayega, directly aapko approach karega. Kyunki lead to wahi hai sir, buyer to wahi hai.
Customer: Haan, isko koi baat nahi, dekhte hain isko abhi chaliye koi. Ji sir.
Executive: Aapne bata diya abhi isko dekhte hain jaisa bhi hoga na. Karta hu.
Customer: Haan, wahi keh raha hu main aap apni sir listing aap ek kaam karo targeted location set kar lo aap apni. Targeted location set karne ke baad kuch categories aap choose kar lijiye jis category mein aap sabse zyada business lena cha rahe ho sir. Fir usi category wise hum promotion start karenge jaise franchise wali category mein aap bhi dekh rahe ho, ye itna zyada competition hai top pe log baithe hue hain sir. Waha pe agar aapne listing apni le li na, to aap samjho ki aapki month mein ek deal definitely franchise se related hogi hi hogi sir. Un logon ke paas do-do, dhai-dhai hazar inquiry ka flow ja raha hai per month sir. Aap samjho do-dhai hazar inquiry mein se sir, aap aisa to hai nahi sir ki ek inquiry franchise ki wo convert na kar pa rahe ho. Wo convert kar rahe hain sir, tabhi ek-ek category ka sir itna bada amount advance bhi kar rahe hain sir. Aur aap samjho ki aapki.
Customer: Haan, koi nahi, theek hai. Samajh gaya main kya baat kar rahe ho, dekhte hain jo bhi hoga karte hain hum dekh aapko.
Executive: Ji, to wo aapka jo concern tha aapka.
Customer: Haan, concern ko aap close kar dijiye, close kar do aap concern, koi dikkat nahi.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested improving listing and targeted location.

- Executive explained benefits of franchise category promotion.



Next Steps: 

- Issue resolved.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, listing, promotion, franchise
